channel.title: rbuilder on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in rbuilder on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: When Hard Work Pays Off: rBuilder 5.8 for Linux and Windows
item.description: It’s been a while since I last wrote anything here, mainly because I have been working very hard on a very cool project for work that I can now finally talk about it. rPath, the place where I have been working for the last 4+ years has just announced the release of rBuilder 5.8, bringing “model-driven, version-controlled system automation deeper into the enterprise with active inventory management and support for Windows”.
